name: Project Als #001
description:
En este juego INACABADO tendras que sobrevivir luchando contra goblins que apareceran cada cierto tiempo

CONTROLES

-WASD para moverte

-Click izquierdo para disparar

_________________________________________________________________

This game is in development. you will have to survive fighting against goblins that will appear every so often

CONTROLS

-WASD to move
-Click left to shoot
